name: Thug Life
description:
The movie focuses on a morning in the life of a notorious gang leader, as his daily activities are finally interrupted by a police counterattack.
Fight your way out of extreme odds and become a legend.

Realistic gun handling featuring a colt 1911, AK and a Pump shotgun. Hold and load magazines in and out, pump the shotgun and pull sliders.
Realistically rendered world with PBR materials featuring city locations both outside and inside buildings. Environments include destructible assets
and target shooting opportunities.
